p: Iφ, experimental retention indices of the analyte “a” in the stationary phase “ φ”; z, number of carbons of the n-alkane with the closest previous elution to “ a”; T ( z) , retention time of the n-alkane with the closest previous elution to “ a”; T ( z+1) , retention time of the n-alkane with the closest after elution to “ a”; T ( a) , Retention time of the analyte “ a” .
